name: Free Gas (Free wheel to the Gas Station)
name_original: Free Gas (Free wheel to the Gas Station)
description:
You are a broke delivery person and you’re almost out of fuel. You need to make some deliveries to earn money for fuel. Work out the most efficient pick-up and delivery routes to save on fuel and help you make it to the gas station. 

Use your keyboard's arrows or WAD to drive. W=gas, A=turn left, D=turn right. Use Q to change gears to D, N or R. space to brake

*TIP: Going down hills in Neutral will save fuel.
